text: The Cauvery Delta Farmers’ Welfare Association has emphasised the need for establishing a factory to produce value added products from banana in Tiruchi. In a statement issued here, Mahadhanapuram Rajaram, executive president, and Gandhipithan, general secretary, Cauvery Delta Farmers Welfare Association, said though the state government had promised to establish a banana powder manufacturing unit in Manikandam in Tiruchi district, the factory is yet to come up. Several value added products such as jam, jelly, wine and powder could be produced from banana, he said.
title: ‘Start a factory for value-addition’
